summary.keyFinding: Tennessee lacks a statewide municipal council district aggregator. The Comptroller maintains city boundaries for all 345 municipalities but NOT council/ward districts. Council districts are maintained at county/city level only.

statewideSources.name: TN STS GIS - City Boundaries

layers.name: City Boundaries
layers.source: Tennessee Comptroller - Office of Local Government
layers.note: All 345 TN municipalities but NO council districts

statewideSources.bulkExtractionValue: LOW - Only municipal boundaries, not council districts

statewideSources.name: TN STS GIS - Voting Districts

layers.name: VOTING DISTRICTS
layers.source: Comptroller of the Treasury - Office of Local Government

statewideSources.note: State voting precincts by county, NOT municipal council districts

statewideSources.name: TN Comptroller Municipal Boundaries Dashboard
statewideSources.description: Explore boundaries for all 345 cities and towns with annexation/deannexation history since 2016
statewideSources.note: Visualization only - no direct council district data
statewideSources.bulkExtractionValue: NONE - Dashboard only, not data service

regionalAggregators.name: Greater Nashville Regional Council (GNRC)
regionalAggregators.note: Regional planning data but council districts not found in search. Focus is transportation/land use planning.
regionalAggregators.bulkExtractionValue: LOW - No council district layers discovered

regionalAggregators.name: East Tennessee Development District (ETDD)
regionalAggregators.note: No public REST services discovered. Contact required for data access.

countyAggregators.name: Shelby County ReGIS
countyAggregators.note: Zoning service covers multiple municipalities. Election districts service exists but SSL issues prevent direct access.
countyAggregators.bulkExtractionValue: MODERATE - Multi-city zoning available, election districts need investigation

countyAggregators.name: Davidson County / Nashville MetroGIS

layers.name: Council Districts
layers.note: Nashville Metro Council - 35 single-member districts + 5 at-large

countyAggregators.bulkExtractionValue: HIGH - Well-structured council district data for consolidated city-county

countyAggregators.name: Hamilton County GIS (Chattanooga)
countyAggregators.bulkExtractionValue: MODERATE - Council districts layer present, may cover only Chattanooga

countyAggregators.name: Knox County KGIS

knownServices.name: CityWards
knownServices.note: Knoxville City Wards (6 districts) - cached tile service

knownServices.name: DynamicLayers
knownServices.note: Contains Jurisdiction Boundaries, Knoxville City Boundary, Knox County Boundary, Farragut Boundary

countyAggregators.accessNote: REST services require authentication (401 errors on direct access). May need KGIS portal login.
countyAggregators.contact: KGIS Office - 865-215-2641, 606 Main St Suite 150, Knoxville, TN 37902
countyAggregators.bulkExtractionValue: LOW - Authentication required, limited to Knoxville/Farragut

countyAggregators.name: Montgomery County GIS (Clarksville)
countyAggregators.note: Clarksville has 12 wards. GIS maintained through tri-party partnership (County, City, Austin Peay State University)
countyAggregators.bulkExtractionValue: LOW - Single city, visualization app only

individualCityPortals.note: Single-member districts (1-6) + Super Districts (7-9) + district positions
6 wards. KGIS services require authentication. Contact KGIS for data access.

gapAnalysis.majorGap: No statewide aggregator for municipal council/ward districts exists. Tennessee Comptroller maintains city boundaries but not internal governance districts.
requireIndividualCollection: Germantown, Bartlett, Collierville, etc. (no council district layers found)
gapAnalysis.estimatedBulkCoverage: 4-5 major cities via aggregators, ~340 requiring individual outreach

recommendations.action: Extract Nashville Council Districts from MapServer
Extract Memphis Council Districts from FeatureServer
Extract Chattanooga Council Districts from Hamilton County
Contact KGIS for Knoxville ward data access
Investigate Shelby County Election Districts service
recommendations.note: SSL issues - may contain multi-city council district data

recommendations.action: Contact TN Comptroller Geographic Services about council district data
recommendations.note: They maintain all municipal boundaries and assist with redistricting - may have council district data not publicly exposed
